title: Partial Use - Airbnb Room Rental

scenario_info.name: Home with Airbnb Room Rental
scenario_info.description: Sophie lives in her home but rents out a spare room on Airbnb for 5 years. The interest deductibility test applies, requiring floor area apportionment.

expected_result.notes: Floor area and time apportionment required

applicable_rules: ITAA97 s118.190: Interest deductibility test applies

property_history.description: Started renting spare room on Airbnb. Room: 18sqm exclusive, 45sqm shared areas. Total home: 180sqm.

properties.notes: Partial rental (Airbnb room) while living in property. Floor area apportionment: 22.5% income-producing. Rental period: 5 years of 8.4 year ownership.

user_query: I lived in my home for 8 years but rented out a spare room on Airbnb for 5 of those years. The room was 18sqm and guests shared 45sqm of common areas. Total home is 180sqm. What is my CGT liability?
